parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Animations </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> When used on a person, a smooth transition to the given action will be initiated, but all previous playAction are discarded.
<br>
For Arma 3 actions see: [[playAction/actions]]. 

</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> soldier '''playActionNow''' action </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> soldier: [[Object]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> action: [[String]] -  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>soldierOne [[playActionNow]] "SitDown";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>rabbitTwo [[playActionNow]] "WalkF";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[playAction]], [[switchAction]], [[playMove]], [[playMoveNow]], [[switchMove]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part></template>

<h3 style='display:none'>Notes</h3>
<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 12, 2010 - 9:41
<dt class="note">'''[[User:Wolfrug|Wolfrug]] ([[User talk:Wolfrug|talk]])'''<dd class="note">
'''Some other possible playactions:'''<br>
"walkf" - walk forward<br>
"walkb" - walk backwards<br>
"walkr" - strafe right<br>
"walkl" - strafe left<br>
"grabdrag" - initiate First Aid dragging animation<br>
"stopdrag" - stops First Aid dragging animation<br>
"reloadMagazine" - reloads the current magazine<br>
"gestureFreeze" - hand signal "Freeze"<br>
"GestureGo"<br>
"GestureCover"<br>
"GestureAttack"<br>
"GestureCeaseFire"<br>
"GestureFollow"<br>
"GestureUp"<br>
"GestureAdvance"<br>
"GesturePoint"<br><br>

Note that playAction works regardless of stance (rifle up, down, crouched, prone).
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
